alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 5:28PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Duval County through 600 PM EDT... At 528 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fort Caroline, or near Arlington, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Arlington, Atlantic Beach, Neptune Beach, Mayport, Craig Field, Little Talbot Island, Fort Caroline, Talbot Island and Oceanway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval
